title: Request for Your Agency's 2022 Roster & Salary Data (Frederick County Sheriff's Office)

communications.subject: Maryland Public Information Act Request: Request for Your Agency's 2022 Roster & Salary Data (Frederick County Sheriff's Office)

communications.communication: We have received your PIA request and are diligently working it. We hope to have everything to you by no later March 21. Please feel free to reach out to me directly at twivell@frederickcountymd.gov or by calling 301-600-3653.
